Articles.Content:
We all know about Jeb's fascinating with high-powered controlled explosives (i.e. boosters), but what about his drinks? Or specifically, his coffee?

Who here thinks they know what all goes in the probably-explosive pot of danger? No cheating (no reading the ingredients label)!

10% Booster fuel (Otherwise it wouldn't be Jeb's!)

40% Standard coffee (for the flavor.)

5% vanilla extract (Tasty.)

15% Liquid Fuel (Surprisingly harmless.)

30% Coffee Surprise (Mighty surprising.)

^ Is my best guess. What do you think?

He drinks a Mix of Booster fuel and NERVA Fuel and of Course a bit a Kanila extract

Edited October 22, 2013 by Dooz
Add in 10% mystery Goo without changing the other numbers, and you have it. Yes, Jeb's coffee is 110%. Because he his Jeb.

Well the classic Jeb's Coffee is just oxidizer mixed with liquid fuel, with decaf being SRB fuel mixed with liquid fuel. But these days he likes to mix a little !SCIENCE! in for flavor too. Just a dollop of Mystery Goo and a few material bay crystals really livens up the mix. As an added bonus, it's 5000% more dangerous to be exposed to for longer than a few seconds that way to boot!

10% Pure explosives

10% Tastes from something above Ike

10% Joolian Green

20% Mohoian dust

20% Coffee beans

5% Vanilla Extract

5% Laythe Atmosphere

10% caffeine

10% Mystery goo

10% Minmus dust,

50% Rocket fuel (LF+Oxidizer)

5% explosives

35% Swag

0% Safety

69% Booster Fuel

30% Eve Atmosphere

.5% Radon

.2% Flavoring

.3% Various booster shell remnants.
Natural Flavor (to conceal the fact that they're using Kethane as a flavor additive)

It seems my post was removed, so I'll post it again. Jeb drinks normal coffee with a spoonful of sugar. He's only crazy because he drinks too much of it and is also under the influence of a substance which it turns out I'm not allowed to name here, but which was used to keep up the German soldiers' morale in WWII.

Edited July 29, 2014 by xrayfishx
Add 5 tablespoons of Jool's atmosphere and a pint of liquefied regolith from low-gravity worlds and some hydrazine, and you get Jeb's coffee.

10% Capsaisin

30% Bacon grease

20% Matter

20% Antimatter

15% Kraken blood (not to be taken more often than never)

05% Green tea

05% Bad math.

99.80% coton

0.5% thc

0.5% cbd

0.5% dumb lobbies prohibition

oh and &

0.5% theine unrelated to the kofeh streaming pole

low % some atoms

high % void

Coffee is all the universe KSC ever dream for Jeb & the Kerman to explore

Edited August 30, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''

Boil some Eve ocean water and add a tablespoon of loose booster fuel. Add some Mun rocks and/or liquid fuel if you want to.

40% Scott Manleyness

40% Rocket fuel

40% Laythe rock

40% Jool's Atmosphere

Stir in overheating fuel tank for 5 mins.
